business_definition: Data structure for Customer entity with a record length of 500 bytes, containing customer personal information, contact details, and account information
Unique 9-digit numeric identifier for the customer
Customer's first name, up to 25 characters
Customer's middle name, up to 25 characters
Customer's last name, up to 25 characters
First line of customer's address, up to 50 characters
Second line of customer's address, up to 50 characters
Third line of customer's address, up to 50 characters
Two-character state code for customer's address
Three-character country code for customer's address
Customer's postal/ZIP code, up to 10 characters
Primary phone number for customer, up to 15 characters
Secondary phone number for customer, up to 15 characters
Customer's 9-digit Social Security Number
Government-issued identification number or document reference, up to 20 characters
Customer's date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format
Electronic Funds Transfer account identifier, up to 10 characters
Indicator flag to identify if customer is primary card holder (1 character)
Customer's FICO credit score, 3-digit numeric value
Reserved placeholder field used for data structure alignment, padding, or holding constant values
